remarks: If all the values of the mapping are subsets of a class ` C ` , then so is any evaluation of the mapping at a value in the domain of the mapping.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 3-Jan-2018.)
statement:
fvmpt2.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
fvmptssdm $p |- ( ( D e. dom F /\ A. x e. A B C_ C ) -> ( F ` D ) C_ C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
